youtube.name: id
youtube.description: The ID that YouTube uses to uniquely identify the video

youtube.name: description
youtube.description: The description of the YouTube video

youtube.name: duration
youtube.description: Duration of the YouTube video in seconds

youtube.name: channel_id
youtube.description: The ID that YouTube uses to uniquely identify the channel that the video was uploaded to

youtube.name: channel_title
youtube.description: Channel title for the channel that the video belongs to

youtube.name: published_at
youtube.description: The date and time that the video was published

description: Table generated by the simeon-youtube CLI tool using the merge subcommand. It's a dimension table that contains attributes of course videos that are hosted on YouTube.
